name: Telegram Video Player Bot
description: An Telegram Bot By @OnlyFaris To Stream Videos in Voice Chat

API_ID.description: User Accounts Telegram API_ID get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: User Accounts Telegram API_HASH get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token, get it from https://t.me/botfather

SESSION_STRING.description: User Accounts Session String, get it from https://replit.com/@OnlyFaris/genStr

CHAT_ID.description: ID of your Channel or Group where the bot stream Music/YouTube Lives/Live Stream

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist if CHAT_ID is a Group, if channel then leave blank

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of Auth Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users seperated by space)

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'True' If you want to make /play commands only for admins. By default /play is available for all.

STARTUP_STREAM.description: YouTube live / Direct link of a video to stream when the bot starts (Read the README for more info)

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
REPLY_MESSAGE.value: Hello Sir, I'm a bot to stream videos on telegram voice chat, not having time to chat with you ðŸ˜‚!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku api token. Get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of your Heroku app, given in the first blank on this page if deploying to heroku.

IS_NONSTOP_STREAM.description: Change it to 'False' If you want to disable nonstop 24x7 live stream feature. By default it is enabled.
